title: The Commissioner may hand over such PPL to any agency to transparent bidding procedures for its oper
clause_text: The Commissioner may hand over such PPL to any agency to transparent bidding procedures for its operations and maintenance upon such terms and conditions as deem
section: a) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lot (PPL) near Metro Stations
